meanings.definition: The activities associated with the governance of a country or area, especially the debate or conflict among individuals or parties having or hoping to achieve power.
meanings.sent1: In the world of politicks, politicians often engage in heated debates to win votes.
meanings.sent2: She studied politicks to understand how governments make decisions.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show hilariously portrayed the chaos of politicks in a fictional country.
meanings.sent4: The politicks of the corporate world can sometimes be as intense as a battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The history class discussed the impact of politicks on society throughout the centuries.

meanings.definition: The profession or activities of governing or influencing policy.
meanings.sent1: Her passion for politicks led her to pursue a career in public service.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a degree program in politicks for aspiring policymakers.
meanings.sent3: The children played a game pretending to be involved in the politicks of their make-believe country.
meanings.sent4: His negotiation skills in politicks were compared to those of a seasoned diplomat.
meanings.sent5: The book provided a detailed look into the world of politicks and its impact on society.
